Name: 2 - Cost Effectiveness
Answer: While optimizing your work is generally good, you can definitely go overboard and over-optimize. Before we teach you some good ways to optimize for the web, let's see if you can identify which optimizations are beneficial. Which of the following optimizations are worth doing considering both the time and risk? A 10% speed up in launching your editor, that takes one hour. A post-process that tests your app on a mobile screen that takes a day to implement. An editor plugin that autocloses your HTML tags that takes 30 minutes to implement. Or a script that generates images for hi-res devices and takes four hours. Check your answers here.
